[[Center(begin)]]
= '''Validation for tagging HARMONIE-40h1.2'' =

Last modified [[LastModified]]

[[Center(end)]]

This page is a working document for experiments to reach harmonie-40h1.2. Please check [wiki:Harmonie_40h1/potential_updates_for_tagging_40h1.2 potential updates for tagging HARMONIE 40h1.2 updates] for a background and explanations to what tests should be done.

== Targets ==

As decided by the HMG at its meeting in Madrid, March 1-2, 2017.

=== Target 1 (tg1) ===

Following [https://hirlam.org/trac/wiki/Harmonie_40h1/potential_updates_for_tagging_40h1.2 "Potential updates for tagging HARMONIE-40h1.2"] the target 1 will include the "Development name" options:

 * Freezing rain update
 * Bug fixes stratospheric warming
 * Accretion changes
 * COMAD
 * SICE
 * PGD interpolation bug
 * noSBL
 * ~~Smoothing of orography~~ Excluded due to numerical stability problems
